RIG IN A BOX HITACHI AMERICA LIMITED November 2015 to August 2016 Hitachi Consulting Pvt Ltd Responsibilities I worked as a Java Developer and was mainly responsible for developing Restful web services on Spring MVC framework I worked closely with Linux server of the project wherein my primary goal was to install various software on the machine and handle any critical situation that may
